import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react'; import ReactCSSTransitionGroup from 'react-addons-css-transition-group'; import { InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, Col, Nav, Button, TabContent, TabPane, Card, CardBody, Input, CardFooter, Form, FormGroup, Label, CustomInput, Row, UncontrolledButtonDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, NavItem, NavLink, Progress, Container } from 'reactstrap'; import { ResponsiveContainer, } from 'recharts'; import img from './LTE.jpg'; import './app.css'; import ReactTable from "react-table"; const masDat = [ { name: 'Habib Akbar'}, { name: 'Aulia Muslim Hidayatullah'}, { name: 'Habib Akbar Aziz'}, { name: 'Page D'}, { name: 'Page E'}, { name: 'Page F'}, { name: 'Page G'}, { name: 'Page C'}, { name: 'Page D'}, { name: 'Page E'}, { name: 'Page F'}, { name: 'Page G'}, ] export default class MinimalDashboard2 extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.tambah = this.tambah.bind(this); this.toggle = this.toggle.bind(this); this.togglePop1 = this.togglePop1.bind(this); this.state = { popoverOpen1: false, activeTab: '2', modal: false, startDate: new Date(), open: false, data:'', d: '', masDat: masDat, in:'' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.open = this.open.bind(this); } togglePop1() { this.setState({ popoverOpen1: !this.state.popoverOpen1 }); } toggle(tab) { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }); } } tambah() { this.setState({ modal: !this.state.modal }); } handleChange(date) { this.setState({ startDate: date }); } open(){ this.setState({ open:!this.state.open }) } cek(value){ this.setState({ open: !this.state.open, data: value }) } render() { const { data , d } = this.state; const filterData = this.state.masDat ? this.state.masDat.filter( e => e.name.toLowerCase().indexOf(d.toLowerCase()) > -1 ) : this.state.masDat; return (
cek

this.cek(el.name)} style={{ boxShadow:'2px 2px 8px black' }} />

) } }
